positions.subtitle: Tykhe Block Ventures
positions.description: - I enable the firm to grow by venture building with portfolio companies in the BTC ecosystem whilst learning about the new applications Bitcoin. - I also play a role in the IC process by elevating the quality of deal-flow by establishing relationships with founders building new startups within emerging blockchain markets.
positions.title: BTC Ecosystem head
positions.description_html:
- I enable the firm to grow by venture building with portfolio companies in the BTC ecosystem whilst learning about the new applications Bitcoin.

- I also play a role in the IC process by elevating the quality of deal-flow by establishing relationships with founders building new startups within emerging blockchain markets.

experience.title: Self Employed
experience.description: - Created a global network of sellers and local network of buyers- Sourced Sneakers from global markets - Sold rare and expensive sneakers ($1,300+) to Indian consumers and businesses - 30,000$ revenue in 24 hours. - Generated $500,000 in revenue in 3 years.
experience.description_html: - Created a global network of sellers and local network of buyers- Sourced Sneakers from global markets - Sold rare and expensive sneakers ($1,300+) to Indian consumers and businesses - 30,000$ revenue in 24 hours. - Generated $500,000 in revenue in 3 years.  <!---->

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: - Established communication and enabled participation in multiple global competitions for stock market trading competitions such as Wharton’s Global Youth Program. - Helped establishing connections to develop the academic curriculum of this class with local and international universities such as the Indian School of Business and Finance (ISBF) and London School of Economics.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: - Established the foundation for this club, which included being the Secretary General for the first ever JBCN MUN. - Participated and won at multiple MUN conferences across Mumbai. - Trained 60+ students to attend their first MUN ever.
